item.title: MathJax support
item.author: xiaohao890809@126.com (追寻原风景)
item.description: When \(a \ne 0\), there are two solutions to \((ax^2 + bx + c = 0)\) and they are \[x = {-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac} \over 2a}.\]

item.title: Katex support
item.author: xiaohao890809@126.com (追寻原风景)
item.description: We need goldmark katex entension which is not yet we have: [https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/issues/6544](https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/issues/6544) The following $$ \int_{a}^{b} x^2 dx $$ Is an integral $$ \varphi = 1+\frac{1} {1+\frac{1} {1+\frac{1} {1+\cdots} } } $$ Enable Katex in the config file by setting the katex param to true. This will import the necessary Katex CSS/JS. See the online reference of supported TeX functions. Note: For inline math to render correctly, your content file extension must be .
